```{r setup, message=FALSE, fig.align='center', fig.height=5, fig.width= 6}
library(gslope)

d = gslope(mtcars)
summary(d)
coef(d)
graph_plot(d)
plot(d, col = "navy", plt = "corr")
plot(d, plt = "precision")
```
